text: Can anyone show me how their login code works?

<@U043AB2QT>: <@U048TCADN> <@U06BH5ZPW> <@U050WT24D> <@U062TJYHW> <@U04A6P1QU> <@U05485UQL> <@U03SSL0FM> <@U043AB2QT> <@U03V8C0DJ> <@U046FCXL7>  Can anyone show me their login / signup code? I’m totally stuck with some bad authentication
<@U04UGLGMJ>: How's about we start with the code you currently have and see if we can improve it from there? Got a gist or public repo we can have a squiz at?
